description: T1 London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20%Tree work is to be undertaken to remove dead branches to improve form and increase safety in accordance with good arboriculture practice and maintain the future well being and growth of the trees.Tree work is to be undertaken to remove dead branches to improve form and increase safety in accordance with good arboriculture practice and maintain the future well being and growth of the trees.Outside nos. 42-44  - T1 London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20%Outside No 46 - T2London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20%Outside No's 48-50 - T3 London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20%Outside No 54-58 - T4London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20%Outside No 62 -T5London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20% and assure clearanceOutside No's 90-94 - T6 London Plane tree, remove deadwood, cut back from building to give 3m clearance to block and crown clean / thin by 20%
